content.question: What do the speakers finally agree to do?

choices.label: They will host a French event in the afternoon.
They will eat at a French restaurant in the afternoon.
They will try out a Chinese restaurant on the weekend.
They will meet at a French arts festival on the weekend.

content.answer: They will try out a Chinese restaurant on the weekend.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
